sentence.Network_en: "Ah, Captain Fox," Martin McGuinness said affably. "Nice to see you again."
sentence.Network_cn: “啊，福克斯上尉，”马丁·麦吉尼斯亲切地说，“很高兴再次见到您。”

sentence.Network_en: 'so long,'said the other, smiling affably and going on.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 再见, "另一位说, 友好地笑了笑,继续赶路.

sentence.Network_en: " Oh, that don't matter,'said the other affably.
sentence.Network_cn: “ 噢, 那没关系的, "那人和气地回答.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(A) ... affable 可亲的 affably 殷勤地 affair 事务.
...affable a和蔼可亲的；（天气等）宜人的affably adv温柔地；友善地B

list.abs: he found her parents very affable ., 他觉得她父母很好说话.
He is an affable man , always willing to stop and talk ., 他是一个和蔼的人 , 总是乐于停下来与人交谈.
He is an affable man , always to stop and talk ., 他是一个和蔼的人 , 总是乐于停下来与人交谈.
good appearance and manner , flexible and have strong affability .形象气质较好，头脑灵活，具有较强亲和力。

entry.def: Someone who is affable is pleasant and friendly.

example.ex: Mr Brooke is an extremely affable and approachable man.
example.tran: 布鲁克先生极为谦和，平易近人。

sentences.sentence: "`Come and visit me,' he said amiably"

auth_sentence.content: It was my turn to shake his hand as he affably greeted each of the group of hacks I was with.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was my turn to shake his hand as he affably greeted each of the group of hacks I was with.
